programme.title: Τένις: ATP Masters 1000 2024
programme.desc: Παρίσι. Ηµιτελικοί. To ATP Masters είναι μια σειρά από 9 τουρνουά τένις, στα οποία συμμετέχουν οι κορυφαίοι της κατάταξης στο ATP Tour. Οι διοργανώσεις διεξάγονται στην Ευρώπη, τη Βόρεια Αμερική και την Ασία.

programme.title: Premier Padel Tour 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Το Premier Padel είναι η μόνη διοργάνωση που προσφέρει επίσημους πόντους κατάταξης στους παίκτες και τα τουρνουά P1 απονέμουν στους νικητές 1000 πόντους κι ένα μεγάλο χρηματικό έπαθλο.

programme.title: Χάντμπολ: Ράιν Νέκαρ - Άιζεναχ
programme.desc: DAIKIN Hanball Bundesliga 2024-25. 9η Αγωνιστική. Η 60ή σεζόν του πρωταθλήματος χάντμπολ της Γερμανίας διαρκεί από τις 5 Σεπτεμβρίου 2024 έως τις 8 Ιουνίου 2025 και περιλαμβάνει 18 ομάδες. Η SC Magdeburg είναι η κάτοχος του τίτλου. Περιγραφή: Παύλος Παλαιστής.

programme.title: Sports Classics: The Outdoor Sports Show 2024
programme.desc: Αυτή η σειρά παρουσιάζει ένα ευρύ φάσμα υπαίθριων σπορ καθώς και τους αθλητές που αγωνίζονται σε αυτά. Η εκπομπή καλύπτει από επαγγελματικά και ψυχαγωγικά έως και extreme sports, όπως αγώνες μαραθωνίου, αναρρίχηση, σκι, σέρφινγκ, πεζοπορία, τρίαθλο, ιστιοπλοΐα και ποδηλασία.

Η 'μάχη' μεταξύ των πολεμικών τεχνών και η ανάδειξη του 'απόλυτου πρωταθλητή' μόνο στα κανάλια COSMOTE SPORT. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Γάτσης.

programme.title: Τένις: ATP Masters 1000 2024
programme.desc: Παρίσι. Τελικός Διπλού. To ATP Masters είναι μια σειρά από 9 τουρνουά τένις, στα οποία συμμετέχουν οι κορυφαίοι της κατάταξης στο ATP Tour. Οι διοργανώσεις διεξάγονται στην Ευρώπη, τη Βόρεια Αμερική και την Ασία.

programme.title: Τένις: ATP Masters 1000 2024
programme.desc: Παρίσι. Τελικός Μονού. To ATP Masters είναι μια σειρά από 9 τουρνουά τένις, στα οποία συμμετέχουν οι κορυφαίοι της κατάταξης στο ATP Tour. Οι διοργανώσεις διεξάγονται στην Ευρώπη, τη Βόρεια Αμερική και την Ασία.

programme.title: Χάντμπολ: Ράιν Νέκαρ - Άιζεναχ
programme.desc: DAIKIN Hanball Bundesliga 2024-25. 9η Αγωνιστική. Η 60ή σεζόν του πρωταθλήματος χάντμπολ της Γερμανίας διαρκεί από τις 5 Σεπτεμβρίου 2024 έως τις 8 Ιουνίου 2025 και περιλαμβάνει 18 ομάδες. Η SC Magdeburg είναι η κάτοχος του τίτλου.

programme.title: Sports Classics: Worldies
programme.desc: Από τη F1 έως την υψηλή κατάδυση και ένα σωρό άλλα extreme sports, κάθε εκπομπή παρουσιάζει και αναδεικνύει μέσα από 5 βίντεο μερικές από τις πιο απίστευτες στιγμές, διοργανώσεις και αθλητές σε όλα τα σπορ δράσης.

programme.title: Πάντελ: Premier Padel Tour 2024
programme.desc: Νέα Γκίζα. Τελικός Ανδρών. Το Premier Padel είναι η μόνη διοργάνωση που προσφέρει επίσημους πόντους κατάταξης στους παίκτες και τα τουρνουά P1 απονέμουν στους νικητές 1000 πόντους κι ένα μεγάλο χρηματικό έπαθλο. Περιγραφή: Παύλος Παλαιστής.

programme.title: Topspin
programme.desc: Η μοναδική εκπομπή για το τένις, φιλοξενεί πλούσια αγωνιστική επικαιρότητα και θεματολογία από το χώρο του τένις, στην Ελλάδα και το εξωτερικό.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Ο Κόσμος της Ιστιοπλοΐας 2024
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: Jet Ski World Series 2024
programme.desc: Φτάνοντας τα 100km/h σε λιγότερο από 3,8 δευτερόλεπτα και με ιπποδύναμη 500 αλόγων, oι αναβάτες καλούνται να κάνουν στροφές 30 μοιρών με ταχύτητες 140 km/h. χωρις προστατευτικό εξοπλισμό, παλεύοντας με τα κύματα και τη βαρύτητα.

programme.title: Topspin

programme.desc: Έντµοντον, Καναδάς. Το καράτε ανταγωνίζεται το κουνγκ φου και το μποξ το ζίου ζίτσου. Το κικ μποξ έρχεται αντιμέτωπο με το τζούντο και η πάλη με το μάι τάι. programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: Falling Like Snowflakes
programme.desc: Determined to capture a rare shot of a 12-sided snowflake, a photographer enlists help from a childhood friend as they go on a mission they'll never forget.

programme.title: A Very Vermont Christmas
programme.desc: A local champion skier and Vermont brew master teams up with an unlikely match to create a seasonal microbrew to save her family's business before Christmas.

programme.title: A Not So Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A tabloid journalist tries to land an interview with a reclusive count during the holidays. In response, the royal family asks a groundskeeper to pose as the count since the real one fled years ago.

programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman plans to meet her future in-laws at Christmas and, through a serendipitous series of events, spends the holiday with a warm and caring family whose son catches her eye.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Harrington Davis, author of the popular book series "Magic in Mistletoe," loses his holiday spirit, his publicist, April, must step in to help him save his career and find the magic again.

programme.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between the new CEO of a small-town cookie company and the owner of a local bakery as they try to recreate a stolen secret recipe.

programme.title: Operation Nutcracker
programme.desc: When an antique nutcracker set to be auctioned at the Warby family Christmas charity goes missing, a demanding event planner and the heir to the Warby dynasty try to track it down.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Holiday Mismatch
programme.desc: New retiree Barb joins a Holiday Committee but clashes with long standing member Kath. When they realize their kids have started dating, they conspire to break up the happy couple.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: When a snowstorm disrupts both Lina's and Max's holiday plans, they realize they must work together to find a way home -- without taking it out on each other.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: When a snowstorm disrupts both Lina's and Max's holiday plans, they realize they must work together to find a way home -- without taking it out on each other.

programme.title: A Cozy Christmas Inn
programme.desc: A real estate executive travels to Alaska during the holidays to acquire a bed-and-breakfast, only to discover it's owned by her ex. She's soon falling in love with the town and quite possibly him all over again.

programme.title: Christmas Waltz
programme.desc: A woman makes an unexpected connection with her dance instructor after her storybook Christmas wedding is canceled.

programme.title: A Tale of Two Christmases
programme.desc: Thanks to some holiday magic, Emma gets to experience two different Christmases -- one where she stays in the city and celebrates with a new crush and his friends, and one where she returns home for all the traditions with her family.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: My Grown-Up Christmas List
programme.desc: A journalist and a military man share a special bond that grows between them over the course of several Christmases they spend together and apart.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas Crush
programme.desc: Ava accepts the opportunity of a lifetime to work at the Royal Ice Hotel, which leads to a surprise whirlwind romance with the most important guest of all, the prince himself.

programme.title: A Biltmore Christmas
programme.desc: A magical hourglass sends modern-day screenwriter Lucy Hardgrove to the set of the 1947 holiday movie classic "His Merry Wife!" However, before she can return to the present, Lucy must make things right or threaten to alter the future forever.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly: Lit Up
programme.desc: Emily and Jared are looking forward to celebrating the holidays together again, this time as a couple. They're also ready to work with members of the community to make this year's Christmas festivities the best yet.

programme.title: The Royal Nanny
programme.desc: Working under cover as a nanny, an MI5 agent must resist the charms of Prince Colin while keeping the royal family safe during Christmastime.

programme.title: Holiday Mismatch
programme.desc: New retiree Barb joins a Holiday Committee but clashes with long standing member Kath. When they realize their kids have started dating, they conspire to break up the happy couple.

programme.title: Everything Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her roommate embark on a road trip to Yuletide Springs, a town where Christmas is celebrated year-round.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: Time for Her to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Carly heads to a quaint town to lead the church choir during Christmastime. As she gets to know an Army veteran and the townspeople, she stumbles across clues that suggest she may have been brought there for a life-changing reason.

programme.title: USS Christmas
programme.desc: Maddie, a reporter for a Norfolk newspaper, embarks on a Tiger Cruise during Christmastime where she meets a handsome naval officer and stumbles upon a mystery in the ship's archive room.

programme.title: Sugar Plum Twist
programme.desc: After failing to get the coveted role of the Sugar Plum Fairy in "The Nutcracker," an aspiring ballerina joins forces with a retiree from the New York City Ballet to create her own dance spectacular -- with a Latin twist.

programme.title: My Christmas Guide
programme.desc: After losing his eyesight, a college professor adopts a seeing-eye dog from a guide dog trainer. As they all spend time together, his confidence returns and his heart begins to open.

programme.title: Every Christmas Has a Story
programme.desc: While on air, a TV personality accidentally admits she hates Christmas. When she goes to a small town to film a special to repair her image, the Christmas spirit begins to change her life.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: After moving back to her hometown, a woman plots with her siblings and grandparents to help her father's new bed and breakfast get a five-star review from an incognito travel critic.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Journey Back to Christmas
programme.desc: A nurse (Candace Cameron Bure) from World War II is transported in time to 2016 and meets a man who helps her discover the bonds of family and that the true meaning of Christmas is timeless.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who may just be here to buy her family's parkland.

programme.title: Marry Me at Christmas
programme.desc: A bridal boutique owner who is deep in the flurry of planning an exquisite Christmas wedding is unexpectedly swept off her feet by the bride's brother.

programme.title: Christmas in the Air
programme.desc: A no-nonsense professional organizer (Catherine Bell) learns that opposites do attract when she begins to fall for her client, a frazzled widower (Eric Close) who spends his time inventing toys.

programme.title: Christmas Sail
programme.desc: When Liz returns home to take care of her estranged father, she is determined to give her daughter a perfect Christmas.

programme.title: 'Twas the Night Before Christmas
programme.desc: A former actress takes charge of a town's annual Christmas Eve courtroom production, in which the true authorship of the famous poem "A Visit From St. Nick" is debated.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: As Michelle's wedding approaches, Hannah steps up to finish the new Evergreen museum's launch while questioning her future with Elliot.

programme.title: Cranberry Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple feign marital bliss on national television to help their town's Christmas festival and their business, but rekindled love is complicated by new opportunities.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Tidings of Joy
programme.desc: A skeptical writer shows up in Evergreen to get the scoop on the town's famed passion for Christmas during a search for a long-lost time capsule.

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: A young psychology professor has to choose between marrying her longtime beau or accepting a once-in-a-lifetime job. To help her make a decision, a magical messenger lets her see both possible futures so she'll be able to make the right decision.

programme.title: A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Hotel manager Willow returns to her stunning Virginia hometown to help her sister plan a Christmas wedding at the inn her family once owned.

programme.title: The Christmas Promise
programme.desc: Nicole learns to deal with grief, with the help of her grandfather and a carpenter she hires to renovate the home that was once meant for her and her fiancé.

programme.desc: Lasalle must investigate his former partner in the Vice unit after the NCIS team finds a link between an international drug ring and the New Orleans Police Department; Rita looks into a connection between the mayor and illegal activity in Clearwater.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.desc: Olimpija je favorit u Sloveniji, ali plasmani njihove reprezentacije pokazuju da imaju veoma široku bazu igrača. Možda budemo svedoci nekog iznenađenja?

programme.title: Rukomet - Nemačka liga: Fuchse - Kiel
programme.desc: Rukometna Bundesliga je najviši rang takmičenja u Nemačkoj. Kvalitetom igre smatra se jednim od najkvalitetnijih rukometnih liga na svetu. (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal - Norveška liga: Molde - Bodo
programme.desc: Prva liga Norveške je najviše fudbalsko ligaško takmičenje u Norveškoj. (LIVE).

programme.title: Košarka - Grčka liga: Panathinaikos - Promitheas
programme.desc: Pratite prenose Grčke lige, prestižnog takmičenja čije je prvo izdanje održano u sezoni 1927/1928. Takmičenje svake sezone okuplja 12 klubova, a ubedljivo najuspešnija ekipa od osnivanja lige je... (LIVE).
